n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>SIMDEV</SCHEMA> <NAME>VF1_MOTION</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_SESSION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_FRAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_GAMEHOST</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_TIMESTAMP</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_YAW</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_PITCH</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_ROLL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_WORLDPOSX</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_WORLDPOSY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>M_WORLDPOSZ</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>WORLDRIGHTDIRX</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>WORLDRIGHTDIRY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>WORLDRIGHTDIRZ</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>WORLDFORWARDDIRX</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>WORLDFORWARDDIRY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>WORLDFORWARDDIRZ</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select m."DATA$m_session" m_session, m."DATA$m_frame" m_frame, m."DATA$m_gamehost" m_gamehost, to_number(m."DATA$m_timestamp") m_timestamp, to_number(m."DATA$m_yaw") m_yaw, to_number(m."DATA$m_pitch") m_pitch, to_number(m."DATA$m_roll") m_roll, to_number(m."DATA$m_worldPosX") m_worldPosX, to_number(m."DATA$m_worldPosY") m_worldPosY, to_number(m."DATA$m_worldPosZ") m_worldPosZ, to_number(m."DATA$worldRightDirX") worldRightDirX, to_number(m."DATA$worldRightDirY") worldRightDirY, to_number(m."DATA$worldRightDirZ") worldRightDirZ, to_number(m."DATA$worldForwardDirX") worldForwardDirX, to_number(m."DATA$worldForwardDirY") worldForwardDirY, to_number(m."DATA$worldForwardDirZ") worldForwardDirZ from "F1SIM-MOTION" m</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
